title: RetnuhMacs
author: RetnuhMacs
content: I am exposing the crypto ciminal Jussi-Pekka Erkkilä on github he was the CTO of the scam company Localbitcoins.com:https://github.com/juerkkil/cryptopieces/issues/1Backup: https://twitter.com/RetnuhMacs78886/status/1665610463755788288

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: So, you've exposed this "scammer" by making a post on Twitter calling him a scammer?Second, aren't you getting tired of creating accounts over accounts and stupid topics after stupid topics?You're already at the hundred mark with those, just give it a rest, nobody cares about your gibberish accusations anymore!

comments.author: RetnuhMacs
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on June 05, 2023, 10:30:04 AMSo, you've exposed this "scammer" by making a post on Twitter calling him a scammer?Second, aren't you getting tired of creating accounts over accounts and stupid topics after stupid topics?You're already at the hundred mark with those, just give it a rest, nobody cares about your gibberish accusations anymore!Be aware if this use he is a scammer by himself here his review:...HourlyMiner   2020-08-31   Reference   Ponzi schemeTorch-protocol   2020-08-30   Reference   Plagiarized contentP2PB2B Bounty Manager   2020-08-27   Reference   p2pb2b - scam exchange, fake team members, fake volumetradetoken3   2020-08-18   Reference   FAKE TEAM / Stealing people's identityMorCrypto   2020-08-06   Reference   Ran a ponzi scheme, plagiarized content from Binance.halvmining   2020-07-30   Reference   Fake team, fake offers, stay away from it! ...

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: OP, Stompix is not against someone making a scam accusation report but rather after the basis for making the report, you just provided us a twitter link probably and assume that the required way of filing a scam accusation report, you need to learn how to do this the appropriate ways and this begins with your clear explanation of the issues on ground, proving them with enough evidence with references, i will suggest you go back to learn on how to report a scam because most of the things you guys brought here are not even scam related issues.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: RetnuhMacs on June 05, 2023, 09:37:51 PMBe aware if this use he is a scammer by himself here his review:I have never really seen a very ignorant and rigid person like you. You are creating multiple accounts, posting about the same useless scam accusation over and over again. Even when you are advised, you instead take offense and insult the advisor.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What do you expect will happen or we will do for you? This forum is for ordinary people who prefer privacy and when you are talking about describing a person as a fraud who will require a judicial investigation, without a good lawyer and his charges are clear and in violation of local laws in Helsinki, Finland, I do not expect that you will win this case or at least move public opinion with you.Creating more accounts and trying to revive them every once in a while will not help you with anything, you are wasting your time and people will start ignoring your posts, so tell us how we can help you and accurately describe why you think CTO of Localbitcoins is a scammer?
